title: LF D3+ Mid/Top for scrims/transition to roster for team
body:
Forming a roster of players to start scrimming as general practice/variation of SoloQ. If things go well, the intention is to transition into a team for the coming OOL split and other tournaments.

If you have scrim/5s experience, play with a competitive mentality,  and are available most evenings, HMU.
